verses.roman:
'kṛṣṇa' 'kṛṣṇa' kahi' kare ghaṭera prārthana
'kṛṣṇa' 'kṛṣṇa' kahi' kare ghaṭa samarpaṇa

synonyms: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa kahi'-while chanting "Kṛṣṇa, Kṛṣṇa"; kare—do; ghaṭera—for the waterpots; prārthana—begging; kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; kahi'—chanting; kare—does; ghaṭa—of the waterpots; samarpaṇa—delivery.
translation: One person begged for a waterpot by chanting the holy names "Kṛṣṇa, Kṛṣṇa," and another delivered a pot while chanting "Kṛṣṇa, Kṛṣṇa."
